para.para: Comparator for TWave objects, based on TWave::indicesBz.

listitem.para: bool operator() (const TWave< D > &a, const TWave< D > &b) const
Function (a, b) returns true iff a.indicesBz > b.indicesBz.

section.title: Detailed Description
section.para: Comparator for TWave objects, based on TWave::indicesBz.
Used to sort in descending order of Bz (Brillouin zone) indices.
Definition at line 74 of file TWave.h.
